name: CRACKS (Mosu, classheikki, Lasd)
description:
Ever made a mistake and wished the ground would swallow you up? That wish has been granted, but the underground proves to be a treacherous maze in which a wrong turn will send you spiraling further. Listen to your feelings and don't be led astray by discouraging thoughts.

Made for Global Game Jam 2023 with a few post-jam polishes.

Chride Lassheikki (itch.io)
Heli Linnus (airwiggles, twitter)
Lassi Vapaakallio (itch.io)
Mosu Äijälä (itch.io)
